page.title: 02Employment on Deeside
page.content: The{Delyn Enterprise Zones}in Flint are pieces of land in the Borough of Delyn used for industrial development. It is trying to provide much needed employment in the area. As there are disadvantages in relying on one big factory in the area, the Council are trying to concentrate on smaller factories. The Enterprise Zone is ideally situated for industry, as there are very good{road links.} {Shipping}is also easy, as there is Mostyn and the large Liverpool Dock. With three{airports}nearby, Hawarden, Speke and Manchester, transport by air is convenient. People should come to Delyn because of the Enterprise Zone and because of the{historical}places such as Flint castle and the seaside resorts and{leisure}activities. All in all, Delyn is an attractive area of North Wales.
